verses.verse: הַֽלְלוּיָ֨הּ ׀ <S%H1984><s%> Praise הוֹד֣וּ <S%H3034><s%> O give thanks לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> for [he is] good כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

מִ֗י <S%H4310><s%> Who יְ֭מַלֵּל <S%H4448><s%> Who can utter גְּבוּר֣וֹת <S%H1369><s%> the mighty acts יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יַ֝שְׁמִ֗יעַ <S%H8085><s%> show כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H8416><s%> deep

אַ֭שְׁרֵי <S%H835><s%> Blessed שֹׁמְרֵ֣י <S%H8104><s%> [are] they that keep מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment עֹשֵׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> [and] he that doeth צְדָקָ֣ה <S%H6666><s%> righteousness בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֵֽת׃ <S%H6256><s%> at all times

זָכְרֵ֣נִי <S%H2142><s%> Remember יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> me O LORD בִּרְצ֣וֹן <S%H7522><s%> with the favour עַמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5971><s%> [that thou bearest unto] thy people פָּ֝קְדֵ֗נִי <S%H6485><s%> O visit בִּישׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3444><s%> me with thy salvation

לִרְא֤וֹת ׀ <S%H7200><s%> That I may see בְּט֘וֹבַ֤ת <S%H2896><s%> the good בְּחִירֶ֗יךָ <S%H972><s%> of thy chosen לִ֭שְׂמֹחַ <S%H8055><s%> that I may rejoice בְּשִׂמְחַ֣ת <S%H8057><s%> in the gladness גּוֹיֶ֑ךָ <S%H1471><s%> of thy nation לְ֝הִתְהַלֵּ֗ל <S%H1984><s%> that I may glory עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with נַחֲלָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H5159><s%> with thine inheritance

חָטָ֥אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> We have sinned עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> like אֲבוֹתֵ֗ינוּ <S%H1><s%> with our fathers הֶעֱוִ֥ינוּ <S%H5753><s%> we have committed iniquity הִרְשָֽׁעְנוּ׃ <S%H7561><s%> we have done wickedly

אֲב֘וֹתֵ֤ינוּ <S%H1><s%> Our fathers בְמִצְרַ֨יִם ׀ <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הִשְׂכִּ֬ילוּ <S%H7919><s%> understood נִפְלְאוֹתֶ֗יךָ <S%H6381><s%> not thy wonders לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not זָ֭כְרוּ <S%H2142><s%> they remembered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> not the multitude חֲסָדֶ֑יךָ <S%H2617><s%> of thy mercies וַיַּמְר֖וּ <S%H4784><s%> but provoked עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by יָ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> [him] at the sea בְּיַם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea סֽוּף׃ <S%H5488><s%> [even] at the Red

וַֽ֭יּוֹשִׁיעֵם <S%H3467><s%> Nevertheless he saved לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> the sake שְׁמ֑וֹ <S%H8034><s%> them for his name's לְ֝הוֹדִ֗יעַ <S%H3045><s%> to be known אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּבוּרָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1369><s%> sake that he might make his mighty power

וַיִּגְעַ֣ר <S%H1605><s%> He rebuked בְּיַם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea ס֭וּף <S%H5488><s%> the Red וַֽיֶּחֱרָ֑ב <S%H2717><s%> also and it was dried up וַיּוֹלִיכֵ֥ם <S%H1980><s%> led בַּ֝תְּהֹמ֗וֹת <S%H8415><s%> them through the depths כַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> as through the wilderness

וַֽ֭יּוֹשִׁיעֵם <S%H3467><s%> And he saved מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> them from the hand שׂוֹנֵ֑א <S%H8130><s%> of him that hated וַ֝יִּגְאָלֵ֗ם <S%H1350><s%> [them] and redeemed מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> them from the hand אוֹיֵֽב׃ <S%H341><s%> of the enemy

וַיְכַסּוּ־ <S%H3680><s%> covered מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> And the waters צָרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6862><s%> their enemies אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> there was not one מֵ֝הֶ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> like לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not נוֹתָֽר׃ <S%H3498><s%> of them left
וַיַּאֲמִ֥ינוּ <S%H539><s%> Then believed בִדְבָרָ֑יו <S%H1697><s%> they his words יָ֝שִׁ֗ירוּ <S%H7891><s%> they sang תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H8416><s%> his praise

מִֽ֭הֲרוּ <S%H4116><s%> They soon שָׁכְח֣וּ <S%H7911><s%> forgat מַעֲשָׂ֑יו <S%H4639><s%> his works לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not חִ֝כּ֗וּ <S%H2442><s%> they waited לַעֲצָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6098><s%> not for his counsel

וַיִּתְאַוּ֣וּ <S%H183><s%> But lusted תַ֭אֲוָה <S%H8378><s%> exceedingly בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness וַיְנַסּוּ־ <S%H5254><s%> and tempted אֵ֝֗ל <S%H410><s%> God בִּֽישִׁימֽוֹן׃ <S%H3452><s%> in the desert

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> And he gave לָ֭הֶם <S%H1992><s%> them שֶׁאֱלָתָ֑ם <S%H7596><s%> them their request וַיְשַׁלַּ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> but sent רָז֣וֹן <S%H7332><s%> leanness בְּנַפְשָֽׁם׃ <S%H5315><s%> into their soul

וַיְקַנְא֣וּ <S%H7065><s%> They envied לְ֭מֹשֶׁה <S%H4872><s%> Moses בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> also in the camp לְ֝אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> [and] Aaron קְד֣וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> the saint יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

תִּפְתַּח־ <S%H6605><s%> opened אֶ֭רֶץ <S%H776><s%> The earth וַתִּבְלַ֣ע <S%H1104><s%> and swallowed up דָּתָ֑ן <S%H1885><s%> Dathan וַ֝תְּכַ֗ס <S%H3680><s%> and covered עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and עֲדַ֥ת <S%H5712><s%> the company אֲבִירָֽם׃ <S%H48><s%> of Abiram

וַתִּבְעַר־ <S%H1197><s%> was kindled אֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> And a fire בַּעֲדָתָ֑ם <S%H5712><s%> in their company לֶ֝הָבָ֗ה <S%H3852><s%> the flame תְּלַהֵ֥ט <S%H3857><s%> burned up רְשָׁעִֽים׃ <S%H7563><s%> the wicked
יַעֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> They made עֵ֥גֶל <S%H5695><s%> a calf בְּחֹרֵ֑ב <S%H2722><s%> in Horeb וַ֝יִּשְׁתַּחֲו֗וּ <S%H7812><s%> and worshipped לְמַסֵּכָֽה׃ <S%H4541><s%> the molten image

וַיָּמִ֥ירוּ <S%H4171><s%> Thus they changed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּבוֹדָ֑ם <S%H3519><s%> their glory בְּתַבְנִ֥ית <S%H8403><s%> into the similitude שׁ֝֗וֹר <S%H7794><s%> of an ox אֹכֵ֥ל <S%H398><s%> that eateth עֵֽשֶׂב׃ <S%H6212><s%> grass

שָׁ֭כְחוּ <S%H7911><s%> They forgat אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> God מוֹשִׁיעָ֑ם <S%H3467><s%> their saviour עֹשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> which had done גְדֹל֣וֹת <S%H1419><s%> great things בְּמִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt

נִ֭פְלָאוֹת <S%H6381><s%> Wondrous works בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land חָ֑ם <S%H2526><s%> of Ham נ֝וֹרָא֗וֹת <S%H3372><s%> [and] terrible things עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יַם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea סֽוּף׃ <S%H5488><s%> by the Red

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Therefore he said לְֽהַשְׁמִ֫ידָ֥ם <S%H8045><s%> that he would destroy לוּלֵ֡י <S%H3884><s%> them had not מֹ֘שֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses בְחִיר֗וֹ <S%H972><s%> his chosen עָמַ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> stood בַּפֶּ֣רֶץ <S%H6556><s%> him in the breach לְפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> before לְהָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> to turn away חֲ֝מָת֗וֹ <S%H2534><s%> his wrath מֵֽהַשְׁחִֽית׃ <S%H7843><s%> lest he should destroy

וַֽ֭יִּמְאֲסוּ <S%H3988><s%> Yea they despised בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land חֶמְדָּ֑ה <S%H2532><s%> the pleasant לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הֶ֝אֱמִ֗ינוּ <S%H539><s%> they believed לִדְבָרֽוֹ׃ <S%H1697><s%> not his word

וַיֵּרָגְנ֥וּ <S%H7279><s%> But murmured בְאָהֳלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H168><s%> in their tents לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁ֝מְע֗וּ <S%H8085><s%> [and] hearkened בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> not unto the voice יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיִּשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> Therefore he lifted up יָד֣וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like לְהַפִּ֥יל <S%H5307><s%> against them to overthrow א֝וֹתָ֗ם <S%H853><s%> בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> them in the wilderness

וּלְהַפִּ֣יל <S%H5307><s%> To overthrow זַ֭רְעָם <S%H2233><s%> their seed בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> also among the nations וּ֝לְזָרוֹתָ֗ם <S%H2219><s%> and to scatter בָּאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <S%H776><s%> them in the lands

וַ֭יִּצָּ֣מְדוּ <S%H6775><s%> They joined לְבַ֣עַל פְּע֑וֹר <S%H1187><s%> themselves also unto Baalpeor וַ֝יֹּאכְל֗וּ <S%H398><s%> and ate זִבְחֵ֥י <S%H2077><s%> the sacrifices מֵתִֽים׃ <S%H4191><s%> of the dead
וַ֭יַּכְעִיסוּ <S%H3707><s%> Thus they provoked [him] to anger בְּמַֽעַלְלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H4611><s%> with their inventions וַתִּפְרָץ־ <S%H6555><s%> brake in בָּ֝֗ם מַגֵּפָֽה׃ <S%H4046><s%> and the plague

וַיַּעֲמֹ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> Then stood up פִּֽ֭ינְחָס <S%H6372><s%> Phinehas וַיְפַלֵּ֑ל <S%H6419><s%> and executed judgment וַ֝תֵּעָצַ֗ר <S%H6113><s%> was stayed הַמַּגֵּפָֽה׃ <S%H4046><s%> and [so] the plague

וַתֵּחָ֣שֶׁב <S%H2803><s%> And that was counted ל֭וֹ לִצְדָקָ֑ה <S%H6666><s%> unto him for righteousness לְדֹ֥ר <S%H1755><s%> unto all וָ֝דֹ֗ר <S%H1755><s%> generations עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> evermore

וַ֭יַּקְצִיפוּ <S%H7107><s%> They angered עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at מֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> [him] also at the waters מְרִיבָ֑ה <S%H4808><s%> provocation וַיֵּ֥רַע <S%H3415><s%> so that it went ill לְ֝מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> with Moses בַּעֲבוּרָֽם׃ <S%H5668><s%> their account

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because הִמְר֥וּ <S%H4784><s%> Because they provoked אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רוּח֑וֹ <S%H7307><s%> his spirit וַ֝יְבַטֵּ֗א <S%H981><s%> so that he spake unadvisedly בִּשְׂפָתָֽיו׃ <S%H8193><s%> with his lips

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הִ֭שְׁמִידוּ <S%H8045><s%> They did not destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽעַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> the nations אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> commanded יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God לָהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> they
וַיִּתְעָרְב֥וּ <S%H6148><s%> But were mingled בַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen וַֽ֝יִּלְמְד֗וּ <S%H3925><s%> and learned מַֽעֲשֵׂיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4639><s%> their works

וַיַּעַבְד֥וּ <S%H5647><s%> And they served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲצַבֵּיהֶ֑ם <S%H6091><s%> their idols וַיִּהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> became לָהֶ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> like לְמוֹקֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H4170><s%> which were a snare

וַיִּזְבְּח֣וּ <S%H2076><s%> Yea they sacrificed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּ֭נֵיהֶם <S%H1121><s%> their sons וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֽוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H1323><s%> and their daughters לַשֵּֽׁדִים׃ <S%H7700><s%> unto devils

וַיִּֽשְׁפְּכ֨וּ <S%H8210><s%> And shed דָ֪ם <S%H1818><s%> blood נָקִ֡י <S%H5355><s%> innocent דַּם־ <S%H1818><s%> [even] the blood בְּנֵ֘יהֶ֤ם <S%H1121><s%> of their sons וּֽבְנוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H1323><s%> and of their daughters אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> Whom זִ֭בְּחוּ <S%H2076><s%> whom they sacrificed לַעֲצַבֵּ֣י <S%H6091><s%> unto the idols כְנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan וַתֶּחֱנַ֥ף <S%H2610><s%> was polluted הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the land בַּדָּמִֽים׃ <S%H1818><s%> with blood

וַיִּטְמְא֥וּ <S%H2930><s%> Thus were they defiled בְמַעֲשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <S%H4639><s%> with their own works וַ֝יִּזְ֗נוּ <S%H2181><s%> and went a whoring בְּמַֽעַלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4611><s%> with their own inventions

וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> kindled אַ֣ף <S%H639><s%> Therefore was the wrath יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּעַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> against his people וַ֝יְתָעֵ֗ב <S%H8581><s%> insomuch that he abhorred אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5159><s%> his own inheritance

וַיִּתְּנֵ֥ם <S%H5414><s%> And he gave בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> them into the hand גּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen וַֽיִּמְשְׁל֥וּ <S%H4910><s%> them ruled בָ֝הֶ֗ם שֹׂנְאֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H8130><s%> and they that hated

וַיִּלְחָצ֥וּם <S%H3905><s%> also oppressed אוֹיְבֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H341><s%> Their enemies וַ֝יִּכָּנְע֗וּ <S%H3665><s%> them and they were brought into subjection תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under יָדָֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> under their hand

פְּעָמִ֥ים <S%H6471><s%> times רַבּ֗וֹת <S%H7227><s%> Many יַצִּ֫ילֵ֥ם <S%H5337><s%> did he deliver וְ֭הֵמָּה <S%H1992><s%> however יַמְר֣וּ <S%H4784><s%> them but they provoked בַעֲצָתָ֑ם <S%H6098><s%> [him] with their counsel וַ֝יָּמֹ֗כּוּ <S%H4355><s%> and were brought low בַּעֲוֹנָֽם׃ <S%H5771><s%> for their iniquity

וַ֭יַּרְא <S%H7200><s%> Nevertheless he regarded בַּצַּ֣ר <S%H6862><s%> their affliction לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like בְּ֝שָׁמְע֗וֹ <S%H8085><s%> when he heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רִנָּתָֽם׃ <S%H7440><s%> their cry

וַיִּזְכֹּ֣ר <S%H2142><s%> And he remembered לָהֶ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> like בְּרִית֑וֹ <S%H1285><s%> for them his covenant וַ֝יִּנָּחֵ֗ם <S%H5162><s%> and repented כְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> according to the multitude [חַסְדֹּו כ] (חֲסָדָֽיו׃ <S%H2617><s%> favour ק)

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> He made אוֹתָ֣ם <S%H853><s%> לְרַחֲמִ֑ים <S%H7356><s%> them also to be pitied לִ֝פְנֵ֛י <S%H6440><s%> of כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all שׁוֹבֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H7617><s%> all those that carried them captives

הוֹשִׁיעֵ֨נוּ ׀ <S%H3467><s%> Save יְה֘וָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> us O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God וְקַבְּצֵנוּ֮ <S%H6908><s%> and gather מִֽן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַגּ֫וֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> us from among the heathen לְ֭הֹדוֹת <S%H3034><s%> to give thanks לְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name קָדְשֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H6944><s%> unto thy holy לְ֝הִשְׁתַּבֵּ֗חַ <S%H7623><s%> [and] to triumph בִּתְהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8416><s%> in thy praise

בָּר֤וּךְ־ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> [be] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֪י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> From הָ֤עוֹלָ֨ם ׀ <S%H5769><s%> from everlasting וְעַ֬ד <S%H5704><s%> even הָעוֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> to everlasting וְאָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> say כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> and let all the people אָמֵ֗ן <S%H543><s%> Amen הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> ye the LORD
